帞字的基本解释

帞
mò
头巾。
古同“袹”：帞头（始丧者头上的避邪巾）。

帞字的汉语字典释义

[①]［mò］
［《廣韻》莫白切，入陌，明。］
亦作“絈1”。亦作“絔2”。
见“帞頭”。

帞字的康熙字典解释

【寅集中】【巾字部】　帞； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页330第18
【廣韻】【集韻】?莫白切，音陌。【廣雅】帞頭，幧頭也。【揚子·方言】絡頭，帞頭也。自關而西，秦晉之郊曰絡頭。南楚江湘之閒曰帞頭。【釋名】綃頭，或曰帞頭，言其從後橫帞而前也。【類篇】帞，邪巾也。　又【廣雅】㒾?謂之帹帞。○按帞與帕音義?同，當通用。　又與袹通。【類篇】袹頭，始喪之服。或从巾。

帞字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
帞字的起名意思

暂无。

mò
scarf.
Gu Tong "snap": silk head (the evil scarf on the head of the first mourner).

[①]［mò］
["Guangyun" Mo Baiqie, enter the Mo, Ming. ]
Also known as "絈1". Also known as "絔2".
See "Bintou".

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Collection] [Scarf Character Department] 　帞; Kangxi Strokes: 9; Page Number: Page 330 Page 18
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Mo Baiqie, Yinmo. [Guang Ya] Yantou, Sitou also. 【Yangtze Dialect】Luotou, Biantou also. From the Guan to the west, the outskirts of the Qin and Jin Dynasties called Luotou. The leisure of Jiangxiang in the South Chu is called Biantou. 【Release name】硡tou, or 帞tou, said that it is from the back to the front. 【Category】Ben, evil scarf also.　 [Guang Ya] 㒾? That is the silk. ○According to the same meaning as Pa Yin?, when common.　It's connected with Kek again. 【Classes】The first mourning dress is to wrap the head. Or from the towel.
